title: The Comparison Page
subtitle: Comparing cryptocurrency market prices across exchanges
body: When using InterTrader, if you're not [searching for profitable trades](/user-guide/finding-profitable-cryptocurrency-pairs/ "Finding profitable cryptocurrency pairs: search and analysis") , a lot of your time will be spent on the comparison page, where you can see: * Prices of a cryptocurrency pair across multiple exchanges * Potential profit * Orderbooks from the exchanges where the coin is listed ## Chart The prominent bar chart on the comparison page provides a quick overview of the buy and sell price across all the exchanges for which InterTrader has coin pair data. ![](/gin-data/images/1527802167227-compare-crypto-chart.png) Tapping bulb icon displays the analysis summary for the coin across all the exchanges. If there is potential profit to be earned, it is displayed here. ![](/gin-data/images/1527802334136-compare-crypto-analysis.png) ![](/gin-data/images/1527802183524-compare-crypto-details.png)
